title: West facing 2x1 in a commuter's dream neighborhood!
posting_body: 3900 Adeline has perfected the union of contemporary new age fashion and industrial artistry, to give you a home that stands alone without any of the additional amenities flair – the perfect sanctuary.

Conveniently nestled on the border of Emeryville and Oakland in the vibrant Longfellow neighborhood of Emeryville; we are just a 20 minute drive from the heart of San Francisco, and a 10 minute drive from Berkeley.
Our vibrant community allows for your life to be simplified as we are centrally located to virtually anything life requires.
0.7 miles from MacArthur BART (9 minute walk)
Multiple grocery stores minutes away (Safeway -- 2 minute walk, Trader Joes -- 5 minute drive, Sprouts -- 8 minute drive, Whole Foods -- 8 minute drive)
Monster Pho Restaurant within the community; Panera Bread and Starbucks just steps away
12 Minute Drive or 25 Minute Bike Ride to University California Berkeley
Three unique community rooms, available for private events
Community lounge room with TV and wireless internet; full kitchen and ping pong table
Fully furnished lounge areas on each floor
Please reach out to our community to discuss our pet policy and breed restriction
One complementary AC Transit via Easy Pass per home
Complementary High-speed internet access in community areas
We look forward to hearing from you.
Stop by today to come and experience your new home!
See Us - 3900 Adeline Street - Emeryville, CA 94608
*Photos shown may not be of the exact unit available*
